form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: NOTICE OF ENTRY OF APPEARANCE AS ATTORNEY OR REPRESENTATIVE, Form G-28

full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/31/2023 NOTICE OF ENTRY OF APPEARANCE AS ATTORNEY OR REPRESENTATIVE In re: DATE 10-14-86 Withfield Hugh Evan Cain FILE No. All 638 538 I hereby enter my appearance as attorney for (or representative of), and at the request of, the following named person(s): NAME Petitioner Applicant Whitfield Hugh Evan Cain Beneficiary ADDRESS (Apt. No.) (Number & Street) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) 1586 West 51st Street Los Angeles, CA 90062 NAME Petitioner Applicant Beneficiary ADDRESS (Apt. No.) (Number is Street) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) Check Applicable Item(s) below: I am an attorney and a member in good standing of the bar of the Supreme Court of the United States or of the highest court of the following State, territory, insular possession, or District of Columbia CALIFORNIA SUPREME and cm not under a (Name of Court) court or administrative agency order suspending, enjoining, restraining, disbarring, or otherwise restricting me in practicing law. 2 I am on accredited representative of the following named religious, charitable, social service, cr similar organization established in the United States and which is so recognized by the Board: 3. I am associated with , the attorney of record who previously filed a notice of appearance in this case and my copearance is at his request. (If you check this item, also check item 1 or 2 whichever is appropriate.) 4. Others (Explain fully.) SIGNATURE COMPLETE ADDRESS 453 South Spring Street, Suite 910 Los Angeles, California 90013 NAME or PRICE and/or Jarry (Type Print) JACK Price T. TELEPHONE NUMBER ROBERT L. RICHARDSON (213) 628-5595 PURSUANT TO THE PRIVACY ACT OF 1974, I HEREBY CONSENT TO THE DISCLOSURE TO THE FOLLOWING NAMED ATTORNEY OR REPRESENTATIVE OF ANY RECORD PERTAINING TO ME WHICH APPEARS IN ANY IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE SYSTEM OF RECORDS: JACK T. PRICE/ROBERT L. RICHARDSON (Name of Attorney or Representative) THE ABOVE CONSENT TO DISCLOSE IS IN CONNECTION WITH THE FOLLOWING MATTER: NAME OF PERSON CONSENTING SIGNATURE OF PERSON CONSENTING DATE Whitfield Hugh Evan Cain XWhilfuld bam 10-14-86 ( NOTE: Execution of this box is required under the Privacy Act of 1974 where the person being represented is a citizen of the United States or an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence.) Form G-28 (OVER) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE (Rev.10-25-79)N Immigration and Naturalization Service
